statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities_logs;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM suspicious_activities_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT activity_type, count(*) as num_activities FROM suspicious_activities_logs GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY num_activities DESC
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Login Attempt' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT destination_ip FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE source_ip = '10.0.0.1'
SELECT details FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.20' AND details LIKE '%attack%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM suspicious_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM suspicious_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM suspicious_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_threats WHERE threat_level > 5 ORDER BY threat_id DESC;
SELECT threat_description FROM security_threats ORDER BY threat_level ASC, threat_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_logs WHERE log_id = 100;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM suspicious_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM suspicious_logs INNER JOIN security_threats ON suspicious_logs.log_id = security_threats.threat_id;
SELECT MAX(threat_level) AS highest_threat_level FROM security_threats;
SELECT log_message FROM suspicious_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT threat_id FROM security_threats WHERE threat_level > 5);
SELECT * FROM suspicious_users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM suspicious_users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT log_content, timestamp FROM suspicious_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, role, last_login FROM suspicious_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, a.activity_type, l.log_content FROM suspicious_users u JOIN suspicious_activities a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN suspicious_logs l ON a.log_id = l.log_id;
SELECT log_content, timestamp FROM suspicious_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT username, role, last_login FROM suspicious_users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, log_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id > 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_logs INNER JOIN suspicious_users ON suspicious_logs.log_id = suspicious_users.user_id;
SELECT user_id, log_content FROM suspicious_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_content LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities_logs;
SELECT log_id, activity_description, log_timestamp FROM suspicious_activities_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT threat_type FROM detected_threats;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_ips WHERE last_activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_type FROM detected_anomalies WHERE anomaly_description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY anomaly_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_description FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT threat_type, COUNT(*) FROM detected_threats GROUP BY threat_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT ip_address, EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM detection_timestamp) AS detection_epoch FROM suspicious_ips ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT anomaly_type, LEFT(anomaly_description, 50) AS short_description FROM detected_anomalies ORDER BY anomaly_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT level_id, level_name FROM threat_level WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE threat_level_id = '12345' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, activity_description, source_ip FROM suspicious_activities_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, log_id, analysis_result FROM log_analysis WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
